scripts.postinstall: npm run prepare:ganache && npm run codegen
scripts.create:ganache: npm run prepare:ganache && graph create gnosis/protocol --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:ganache: npm run prepare:ganache && graph deploy gnosis/protocol --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy gnosis/protocol-rinkeby --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy gnosis/protocol-staging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mainnet:
cli-confirm "

Are you sure the current version is deployed and tested in staging?" && npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy gnosis/protocol --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:xdai: npm run prepare:xdai && graph deploy gnosis/protocol-xdai --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run ts:check && npm run test
scripts.coverage: (cp -r src src_tmp && ts-node scripts/insertCoverageTracing.ts && yarn build && yarn test) ; (rm -rf src && mv src_tmp src)
